name.description: Value used to associate all related radio cards, required for accessibility if used outside of Radio.Group
name.description_zh: 用于关联所有相关单选卡的值，如果在 Radio.Group 之外使用，则为辅助功能所必需

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, numbers are converted to rem, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: key的 theme.radius 或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置 border-radius，数字默认转换为 rem，theme.defaultRadius

value.description: Value of the checkbox, used with Radio.Group
value.description_zh: 与 Radio.Group 一起使用的复选框的值

withBorder.description: Determines whether the card should have border, true by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定卡片是否应具有 border，默认情况下为 true
